FAQ

Homepage /  FAQ

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Unlike many other digital agencies, we take on the challenges of large and technically challenging projects alongside the development of more brand-focused, campaign-specific microsites.

How much does a website cost for my business?

Putting a price tag on something as unique as a website for your business is not an easy task.

Website development is completely customized, tailored to the client's needs. Nowadays, there are many ways to develop your website.

You can approach a website designer (Freelancer) or contact a website development agency, or you can try to develop a website yourself thanks to some good website builders. Depending on your requirements and the method you choose to build your website, the cost will continue to vary.

At Wolf Worldwide, we come up with the prices after a separate analysis of the projects and after brainstorming we work towards achieving the desired results.

Does Wolf Worldwide only create WordPress websites?

WordPress has been trending for years. Websites can be developed using other platforms such as Shopify, Laravel, and many more, but WordPress is the one that stands out.

WordPress is very supportive and flexible in creating any type of website without limitations. Creating a website with more credibility and reliability is more important, so understanding the project requirements and choosing the most appropriate platform will help produce better results.

Browse through our WordPress website development services.

Will you be responsible for maintaining my site for me?

Regular maintenance is essential for a website to stabilize its flexibility and reliability. Proper maintenance would help ensure the security of your website, invite new visitors, boost traffic and more.

Needless to say, we can help you with proper and professional website maintenance, in addition to development, as it helps achieve stabilized growth, keeping your business growing.

Will my website be mobile and tablet-friendly?

Whether it is booking a ticket, ordering online, browsing, etc. people like to do these tasks on the go. So developing a responsive website helps increase the look and feel of your website on both small and large devices. It also increases the number of visitors and search engine rankings.

Yes, we make sure to develop a responsive website that attracts your visitors and delivers an optimized browsing experience.

How long does it take to build a website?

If you have chosen a professional website development company, it takes about 1 to 4 months to start from scratch to finish for basic informational websites with less functionality.

Website builders can help you build your website faster, but it is difficult to rely on them because you have to tackle everything from scratch. Advice or opinion from an expert can help you achieve better results.

How many pages will I receive for my website?

This is something we can work on depending on your requirements. We recommend developing a website with a few pages because that helps optimize your website with SEO in the future, and for one-page websites, it is quite daunting to add more content in the future.

I have a website in place at the moment, how easy is it to change it?

The difficulty of updating an already existing one depends on what changes are needed. If the need is quite complex, it can take time to deliver it, and if only minor changes need to be made it can be handled and delivered at the earliest.

At Wolf Worldwide, we have a conversation with our client and after understanding the requirements, we proceed with the necessary steps.

How long does it take to get on the 1st page of Google?

Typically, it takes at least 6 months for your website to appear on the 1st page of Google, and that depends entirely on the difficulty of the keywords you use in your website. It is quite unpredictable because the competition is quite high these days and almost every company is keen on putting up SEO-optimized websites.

Still have a question?

FREE CONSULTATION

Subscribe to our Newsletter and receive the latest Digital Marketing news in your mailbox.

Starting a blog on your website can be a great way to connect with your audience and gain new customers. However, running a blog takes time and patience. This is why many businesses choose not to run their own blogs but instead use third-party services such as WordPress. Having a blog on your website makes it easier for people to find it and access the latest content you post there.

You also don’t have to spend as much time managing your blog or creating new content – such as posts with valuable information that visitors will want to read again and again. To grow your blog and attract new readers, use one of these strategies: Write relevant and valuable content promote your blog using social media. Create an eye-catching blog layout.
